item.description:
For anyone who loves 80's music (and really, who doesn't??), there's a great band playing at the Pelham this Saturday (7/23) night.

They're called Fast Times, and they rock! They play anything from Blondie to the Ramones, with of course some Def Leppard and Journey.  ﻿ www.fasttimes.biz

I'll be there with a bunch of friends, so if anyone wants to come check it out, come by and say hi!

The band starts pretty promptly at ten, and cover will be $5-10 dollars at that point. If you get there closer to 10:30-11, I've seen cover as high as $15. Also, anyone who knows the Pelham knows it gets very crowded very quickly, so keep that in mind too. The smart bet is to get there closer to 9:30.

 

I'm posting this as a "meet", but this is more like me saying "hey, here's a fun thing to do sat night, I'll be there if anyone wants to come hang out" . Chances are I won't be there till 10, I can never seem to get my friends going in time to get there early. So, I hate to have people waiting on me if I'm late.

 

If you get there and don't know how to find me, you can text me at (508) 965-0534. Just mention your name in the text, since I don't have many of your numbers!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the the rowdy group in front of the stage!
item.name: Fast Times at One Pelham East!
